alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 11:02PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Maricopa Counties through 1145 PM MST... At 1102 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Four Peaks, or 7 miles west of Roosevelt, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Roosevelt, Punkin Center, Tonto Basin, Tonto National Monument, Roosevelt Dam, Four Peaks and Apache Lake. This includes AZ Route 188 between mile markers 240 and 267. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Tonto Basin
